channel.title: Darker Main Menu Backgounds
channel.description: I've noticed the main menus are a lot darker then in then they used to be. you can really tell on the Surface Tension, Forget about Freeman ones.

item.title: Darker Main Menu Backgounds
item.dc:creator: Maki
item.description:
I’ve noticed this too. The blurred preview image for pretty much all the background maps is significantly more bloomy and brighter than the actual loaded map, which feels very dark in comparison. Led me to wonder if I actually had HDR on.

Read full topic
